item.title: Bestselling author of culinary travel books
item.dc:creator: samuelbenjamin
item.content:encoded:
Samuel Benjamin is an author, chef, world traveler, photographer and distiguished journalist. Passionate about what he does, he will transport you to another
time and place.

item.title: About the Author
item.dc:creator: samuelbenjamin
item.content:encoded:
Samuel is a writer with four nationally published books and has been speaking at events since 1998. He started on his first New York Times best seller when he was only 16 years old. He was awarded Distinguished Writer in Residence at his University in 2005. He loves to cook, solo hike, and camp as often as he can. item.excerpt:encoded: Join Samuel and fellow fans this Saturday for a special reading and book signing of his latest published work, Iceland Eats.

item.title: Behind Iceland Eats
item.dc:creator: samuelbenjamin
item.content:encoded:
This authors books are a treat for lovers of food and travel alike. Seeing the varied and sometimes surreal landscapes of his adventures through his unique voice is captivating. I would recommend all of his books whole heartedly. This is an example of a post, you could edit this to put information about yourself or your site so readers know where you are coming from.
